SELECT b.user_acct userAcct, b.user_name userName, b.sex, b.phone, b.mail, b.id_card idCard, b.user_id userId FROM t_info_client a LEFT JOIN t_sys_user b ON a.user_id = b.user_id AND a.is_delete = 0
AND user_name like concat('%', #{userName},'%')
AND user_acct like concat('%', #{userAcct},'%')
LEFT JOIN t_info_store c ON a.invite_code = c.invite_code AND c.is_delete = 0 WHERE c.user_id = #{nowLogin}
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
